com.google.android.exoplayer.demo.full.player

Interface DemoPlayer.InternalErrorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventLogger
    Enclosing class:
    DemoPlayer

    public static interface DemoPlayer.InternalErrorListener
    A listener for internal errors.

    These errors are not visible to the user, and hence this listener is provided for informational purposes only. Note however that an internal error may cause a fatal error if the player fails to recover. If this happens, DemoPlayer.Listener.onError(Exception) will be invoked.
